snippet.title: Shoulders of Giants: Ultimate Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Shoulders of Giants Ultimate is releasing on August 12th! An explosively colorful sci-fi roguelike designed to put your teamwork to the test. Players simultaneously control a sword-wielding robot and a gunslinging space frog, working alone, with a friend, or as one of a team of four.

Coming to Steam, Xbox, PS5 and Epic Game Store.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2283880/Shoulders_of_Giants_Ultimate/
